code: import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';export default function useInterval(callback,delay){var savedCallbackRef=useRef();useEffect(function(){savedCallbackRef.current=callback;},[callback]);useEffect(function(){var handler=function handler(){return savedCallbackRef.current.apply(savedCallbackRef,arguments);};if(delay!==null){var intervalId=setInterval(handler,delay);return function(){return clearInterval(intervalId);};}return function(){return undefined;};},[delay]);}
